Title: App crashes when uploading photos after update 2.1.3
Description: Users report that the app crashes every time a photo upload is attempted, making the app unusable since the last update 2.1.3. Reproduction steps include trying to upload a photo, which results in a crash. Device and OS unknown.

Title: Critical Login Failure with Error 503 on iPhone 13 Pro iOS 16
Description: User reports inability to login, receiving 'Error 503' during login attempts. This issue is critical as it blocks access to work-related tasks. Device: iPhone 13 Pro, OS: iOS 16. Steps to reproduce: Attempt login, observe Error 503 preventing success.

Title: Font size too small on settings page for iPad Mini
Description: The font size on the app’s settings page is reported as too small and difficult to read on an iPad Mini. Reproduction steps: Navigate to settings page and observe font size. This affects usability for users on this device.
